name: Murasaki Sensei's Classroom
description:
ようこそ! Welcome to Murasaki Sensei's Classroom!

Murasaki Sensei's Classroom is in active development and some features may be incomplete. More fun activities will be added in the future! Please provide us with feedback and report any issues you find here or message us on facebook.

Practise your Japanese with engaging and cute activities. Vocabulary is separated into classes so that you can practise at a level suitable to your skill. Each activity is designed to be engaging and cute to make study fun!

Completing an activity will add progress towards earning a sakura blossom. Do your best to earn as many as you can each day!

Jango

Are you a fan of Wordle? Try Jango!

You have 7 attempts to guess the hidden word.

After each guess the characters will change colour to reveal how accurate your guess was.

Flash Cards

Use Flash Cards to practise and build your vocabulary fluency.

Each class has a number of topics to choose from.

Do your best and score as many stars as you can!

Vocabulary List


Every word used in Murasaki Sensei's Classroom can be found in the Vocabulary Lists.

Vocabulary is separated into classes and topics so that you can practise at a level suitable to your skill

Use these lists for your study or as helpful reference for the other activities.

Let's do our best learning Japanese!　たのしくがんばりましょう！
